title: ONE Championship 100, Part 2 video highlights with Aung La N Sang, Aoki, Fernandes
text:
Aung La N Sang remained a two-division champion, and kept Brandon Vera from becoming one.

Sang stopped Vera with a TKO to retain the light heavyweight title at ONE Championship 100’s second of two shows this past Sunday. Sang is the middleweight champ, too. Vera was trying to win another title to add to his heavyweight crown.

In addition to that title fight, Bibiano Fernandes retained his bantamweight title and Shinya Aoki put on a vintage performance.

Check out all the highlights from that card in the video above. And don’t miss the highlights from ONE Championship 100, Part 1, as well.
description: Check out the video highlights from ONE Championship 100, Part 2.
